metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5218 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in text-utils/colcrt.c in colcrt in util-linux before 2.27allows local users to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted file,related to the page global variable.

criterions.comment: bsdmainutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
